mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_bt_promotion_groups ( `promotion_id`, `org_channel_id`, `model_id`, `product_model`, `cat_path`, `num_iid`, `syn_flg`, `created`, `creater`, `modified`, `modifier` ) VALUES( #{promotionId}, #{orgChannelId}, #{modelId}, #{productModel}, #{catPath}, #{numIid}, #{synFlg}, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{creater} )
